entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
